videos.description: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander speeds past De'Aaron Fox and finishes with a layup in the paint.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (SGA blows by Fox to score at the rim) 2022/03/01 ESHEET

videos.headline: SGA blows by Fox to score at the rim

videos.description: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander feeds Aleksej Pokusevski for the hoop and the harm.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Poku finishes strong for and-1 basket) 2022/03/01 ESHEET

videos.headline: Poku finishes strong for and-1 basket

videos.description: De'Aaron Fox is bumped to the ground, but gets his shot to fall anyway.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Fox sinks tough shot while falling down) 2022/03/01 ESHEET

videos.headline: Fox sinks tough shot while falling down

videos.description: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander gets creative at the rim to avoid having his shot blocked on this impressive bucket.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (SGA scoops it high off the glass to score ) 2022/03/01 ESHEET

videos.headline: SGA scoops it high off the glass to score

videos.description: Domantas Sabonis dishes it to Harrison Barnes for an and-1 dunk late in the Kings' win over the Thunder.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Barnes flushes and-1 jam to punctuate Kings' win) 2022/03/01 ESHEET

videos.headline: Barnes flushes and-1 jam to punctuate Kings' win
